verses.roman:
ei-mata premera sevā kare anupama
yāhā dekhi' sarva-lokera juḍāna nayana

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; premera sevā—service in love; kare—performs; anupama—without comparison; yāhā dekhi'-seeing which; sarva-lokera—of all people; juḍāna—become pleased; nayana—the eyes.
translation: "Thus Rāghava Paṇḍita would serve the Lord in an incomparable way. Everyone was very satisfied just to see him."
